author: Staff Reporter
text:
A panel of National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) will inspect Government Arts College, Tiruvannamalai from February 3 to 5.

The panel will consist of S.Chandrasekar, president of NAAC (former vice chancellor, Karnataka University), D.K.Malleswari, coordinator/member (Head, Department of Micro biology, Gurukula Kangri University, Haridwar) and P.K.Yakub, Member (Principal, Ansar Women’s College, Kerala).

They will assess the quality and development of the college and submit a report, principal R.Natarajan said.
title: NAAC panel to inspect arts college
